full_text: Re: Epstein From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/08/27 08:50 Subject: Re: Epstein Attachments: TEXT.htm, Mime.822 Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Thanks very much for letting us know. Would you please give me a call on my cell when you have a moment? It's (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) On Aug 27, 2019, at 8:46 AM, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @(b)(6).gov> wrote: Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Just a heads-up that Judge Berman invited the Warden and I to the hearing this morning. The Warden declined because of another meeting and asked to meet the Judge at a later date, but I'll be attending. I asked (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) if Judge Berman's expectation was for me to sit at counsel's table or in the gallery, but she never responded. In that case, I defer to you unless we hear otherwise when we get there. Thanks, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836-(b)(6) f: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) >>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @(b)(6).gov> 7/30/2019 7:11 PM >>> Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(5) Thanks, .. Page 3923 DOJ-OGR-00023870

text_blocks.content: Re: Epstein From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/08/27 08:50 Subject: Re: Epstein Attachments: TEXT.htm, Mime.822
Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Thanks very much for letting us know. Would you please give me a call on my cell when you have a moment? It's (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

On Aug 27, 2019, at 8:46 AM, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @(b)(6).gov> wrote: Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Just a heads-up that Judge Berman invited the Warden and I to the hearing this morning. The Warden declined because of another meeting and asked to meet the Judge at a later date, but I'll be attending. I asked (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) if Judge Berman's expectation was for me to sit at counsel's table or in the gallery, but she never responded. In that case, I defer to you unless we hear otherwise when we get there. Thanks, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836-(b)(6) f: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The redactions are marked as (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) and (b)(5), indicating that the information has been withheld under specific FOIA exemptions.
